trans-unit.source: Release Notes
trans-unit.target: Release Notes

trans-unit.source: Release Notes for Azure Service Bus
trans-unit.target: Release Notes for Azure Service Bus

trans-unit.source: The <token>sb1</token> components are now included with the Microsoft Azure SDK.
trans-unit.target: The <token>sb1</token> components are now included with the Microsoft Azure SDK.

trans-unit.source: To install, visit the SDK <externalLink><linkText>download page</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212999</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: To install, visit the SDK <externalLink><linkText>download page</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=212999</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: These release notes will be updated periodically.
trans-unit.target: These release notes will be updated periodically.

trans-unit.source: For information about <token>sb2</token> pricing, see the <link xlink:href="812fbc90-55eb-4163-8689-ffb24aec845e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus FAQ</link> topic.
trans-unit.target: For information about <token>sb2</token> pricing, see the <link xlink:href="812fbc90-55eb-4163-8689-ffb24aec845e" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus FAQ</link> topic.

trans-unit.source: What’s New
trans-unit.target: What’s New

trans-unit.source: For an aggregated list of <externalLink><linkText>Service Bus</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/service-bus/</linkUri></externalLink> update announcements, please see <externalLink><linkText>Recent Service Bus Updates</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/updates/?service=service-bus</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For an aggregated list of <externalLink><linkText>Service Bus</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/service-bus/</linkUri></externalLink> update announcements, please see <externalLink><linkText>Recent Service Bus Updates</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/updates/?service=service-bus</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For <externalLink><linkText>Event Hubs</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/event-hubs/</linkUri></externalLink>, see <externalLink><linkText>Recent Event Hubs Updates</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/updates/?service=event-hubs</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For <externalLink><linkText>Event Hubs</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/services/event-hubs/</linkUri></externalLink>, see <externalLink><linkText>Recent Event Hubs Updates</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/updates/?service=event-hubs</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Account Requirements
trans-unit.target: Account Requirements

trans-unit.source: Before running <token>sb2</token> applications, you must create one or more <token>servicensd</token>s.
trans-unit.target: Before running <token>sb2</token> applications, you must create one or more <token>servicensd</token>s.

trans-unit.source: To create and manage your <token>servicensd</token>s, log on to the <externalLink><linkText>Azure management portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=254685</linkUri></externalLink>, and click <ui>Service Bus</ui>.
trans-unit.target: To create and manage your <token>servicensd</token>s, log on to the <externalLink><linkText>Azure management portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=254685</linkUri></externalLink>, and click <ui>Service Bus</ui>.

trans-unit.source: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="fa561f70-007c-45aa-b34d-56317dbbfc87" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace</link>.
trans-unit.target: <token>crdefault</token> <link xlink:href="fa561f70-007c-45aa-b34d-56317dbbfc87" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How to: Create or Modify a Service Bus Service Namespace</link>.

trans-unit.source: SDK Samples
trans-unit.target: SDK Samples

trans-unit.source: By default, the <token>sb2</token> samples are no longer installed with the SDK.
trans-unit.target: By default, the <token>sb2</token> samples are no longer installed with the SDK.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the samples, visit the <token>azure_1</token> SDK <externalLink><linkText>samples page</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=230972</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: To obtain the samples, visit the <token>azure_1</token> SDK <externalLink><linkText>samples page</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=230972</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: For an aggregated list of <token>sb2</token> samples, with links, see <link xlink:href="326d2e16-d70a-4d93-ab24-a84a3ac44305" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus Samples</link>.
trans-unit.target: For an aggregated list of <token>sb2</token> samples, with links, see <link xlink:href="326d2e16-d70a-4d93-ab24-a84a3ac44305" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Service Bus Samples</link>.

trans-unit.source: Most SDK samples and applications contain three authentication requirements:
trans-unit.target: Most SDK samples and applications contain three authentication requirements:

trans-unit.source: Service Namespace: You can use the <token>servicensd</token> you created in your project on the portal.
trans-unit.target: Service Namespace: You can use the <token>servicensd</token> you created in your project on the portal.

trans-unit.source: The <token>servicensd</token> is used to construct <token>sb2</token> endpoints (for example, <codeInline>sb://%%amp;lt;domain%%amp;gt;.servicebus.windows.net/Echo/</codeInline>).
trans-unit.target: The <token>servicensd</token> is used to construct <token>sb2</token> endpoints (for example, <codeInline>sb://%%amp;lt;domain%%amp;gt;.servicebus.windows.net/Echo/</codeInline>).

trans-unit.source: Issuer Name: You can use <userInput>owner</userInput>, which is an issuer that is created by default for you.
trans-unit.target: Issuer Name: You can use <userInput>owner</userInput>, which is an issuer that is created by default for you.

trans-unit.source: Issuer Key/Secret: You can use the <ui>Default Issuer Key</ui> listed on the <ui>Service Namespace</ui> management page on the portal.
trans-unit.target: Issuer Key/Secret: You can use the <ui>Default Issuer Key</ui> listed on the <ui>Service Namespace</ui> management page on the portal.

trans-unit.source: Runtime Requirements
trans-unit.target: Runtime Requirements

trans-unit.source: This release of the <token>sb2</token> includes an updated Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll that targets the .NET Framework 4.5 and is backward compatible with previous versions of Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll (v1.0.0.0, v1.5.0.0, and v1.8.00.
trans-unit.target: This release of the <token>sb2</token> includes an updated Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll that targets the .NET Framework 4.5 and is backward compatible with previous versions of Microsoft.ServiceBus.dll (v1.0.0.0, v1.5.0.0, and v1.8.00.

trans-unit.source: The <token>sb2</token> assemblies are not installed in the .NET global assembly cache (GAC) by default.
trans-unit.target: The <token>sb2</token> assemblies are not installed in the .NET global assembly cache (GAC) by default.

trans-unit.source: The default locations for these assemblies are:
trans-unit.target: The default locations for these assemblies are:

trans-unit.source: C:\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Azure\.NET SDK\v2.6\ref.
trans-unit.target: C:\Program Files\Microsoft SDKs\Azure\.NET SDK\v2.6\ref.

trans-unit.source: Quotas
trans-unit.target: Quotas

trans-unit.source: For information about quotas for <token>sb2</token>, see <link xlink:href="cf068d75-cf5d-46ec-98e7-82462f1ef93c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Service Bus Quotas</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about quotas for <token>sb2</token>, see <link xlink:href="cf068d75-cf5d-46ec-98e7-82462f1ef93c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Service Bus Quotas</link>.
